Walk around the coast from
The start of the walk to Wester Alligin is a bit dodgy but there are easy (and delightful) walks up to the loch at Upper Alligin and (albeit longer) to Red Point. The latter passes Craig.

In the immortal words of a youngish visitor, 'There's naff all there.' It is just a beautiful village near Sea-Loch Diabaig. It is now written up in climbing guides but few climbers stay the night. Actually there is an old graveyard in the woods, though you may need local help in locating it.
If you want a handy pub, don't stay here. The nearest is all of 8 miles by a narrow winding road!
